isChunked().Description: Obtains the 'chunked' flag. The default implementation returns the value of the @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#chunked_E@ attribute.

Parameters: the new Content-Encoding header, or null to unset
setContentEncoding(java.lang.String).Description: Specifies the Content-Encoding header, as a string. The default implementation calls @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#setContentEncoding_E@.

setChunked(boolean).Description: Specifies the 'chunked' flag. The default implementation sets the value of the @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#chunked_E@ attribute.

getContentType().Description: Obtains the Content-Type header. The default implementation returns the value of the @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#contentType_E@ attribute.

Parameters: the new Content-Encoding header, or null to unset
setContentEncoding(org.apache.http.Heade.Description: Specifies the Content-Encoding header. The default implementation sets the value of the @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#contentEncoding_E@ attribute.

getContentEncoding().Description: Obtains the Content-Encoding header. The default implementation returns the value of the @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#contentEncoding_E@ attribute.

Throws: in case of an I/O problem
if a streaming subclass does not override this method
consumeContent().Description: Does not consume anything. The default implementation does nothing if @B_org#apache#http#HttpEntity#isStreaming_E@ returns false, and throws an exception if it returns true. This removes the burden of implementing an empty method for non-streaming entities.

AbstractHttpEntity().Description: Protected default constructor. The attributes of the created object remain null and false, respectively.

Parameters: the new Content-Encoding header, or null to unset
setContentType(org.apache.http.Header).Description: Specifies the Content-Type header. The default implementation sets the value of the @B_org#apache#http#entity#AbstractHttpEntity#contentType_E@ attribute.

Parameters: the new Content-Type header, or null to unset

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Abstract base class for entities. Provides the commonly used attributes for streamed and self-contained implementations of @B_org#apache#http#HttpEntity_E@.
